meanings.sent1: She always talks about herself, showing her egotistical nature.
meanings.sent2: His egotistical behavior often alienates those around him.
meanings.sent3: It's hard to have a conversation with someone so egotistical!
meanings.sent4: Her egotistical attitude makes her think she's better than everyone else.
meanings.sent5: The egotistical man couldn't stop admiring himself in the mirror.

meanings.definition: Characterized by an exaggerated sense of self-importance.
meanings.sent1: The egotistical actor demanded special treatment on set.
meanings.sent2: She displayed an egotistical attitude during the entire meeting.
meanings.sent3: His egotistical behavior at the party was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The egotistical CEO believed he was the only one capable of making decisions.
meanings.sent5: The egotistical politician thought everyone should listen only to him.

meanings.definition: Having an inflated sense of one's own importance.
meanings.sent1: The egotistical professor always believed his opinion was the most valuable.
meanings.sent2: She received criticism for her egotistical remarks during the presentation.
meanings.sent3: It's hard to work with someone so egotistical and full of themselves.
meanings.sent4: The egotistical artist considered his work to be the most significant in the gallery.
meanings.sent5: His egotistical behavior made it challenging for others to collaborate with him.
